title: Create file lock manager module
description: Implement scripts/file-lock-manager.py with atomic file locking using flock (Unix) or msvcrt (Windows). Include timeout with exponential backoff, lock tracking in .claude/locks/ directory, and both exclusive and shared lock support.
completion_notes: Implemented cross-platform file lock manager with flock (Unix) and msvcrt (Windows) support, exponential backoff, lock tracking, stale lock cleanup, and both exclusive/shared lock modes
notes: Critical foundation component - prevents data corruption from concurrent writes
